name: cement production, CEM IV/B | hard coal ash | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19454/documentation

The dataset describes the production of cement (CEM IV/B).

From cradle, i.e. including all upstream activities. As source of gypsum, waste gypsum from flue gas treatment is assumed.

This activity ends with the cement produced in the cement mill. The dataset does not include packaging and administration.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

flow.name: hard coal ash
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste
